title: Gambling Doctor

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Attempt Heal a player, you will randomly give them one of the following:
> {Powerful Cleaning attack
> Visit and give yourself Basic defense}
> Visit
> Basic defense
> Powerful defense
> Invincible defense
> {Overprotective defense
> Death immunity for this night and the next one}
- **Cleave** during the day to reduce the risk. (1 use)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You will not know what you gave your patient or if they got healed.
- Your kills will show up as "Killed by a Neutral role'.

desc:
Post 2954
*Are you sure you need a heart to live?*
